overview:
An award-winning web developer and graduate of the top undergraduate engineering school in the United States, Rose-Hulman Institute of Technology, where he majored in Software Engineering.

He grew up in Covington, Kentucky where he graduated from a CCNA program at Chapman CTC while in high school.

His accomplishments include: *Working with Netvibes.com CTO Jean-Francois Groff, a colleague of Tim Berners-Lee, while creating his school’s IEEE CHC60 Web History website. The site placed in the top 10 worldwide. *Chosen by Experience.com for a job shadow at Juniper Networks in Silicon Valley. *Chosen by ChannelOne.com for a fellowship at their television studios in Hollywood.

His awards include: *1st place in the entire State of Kentucky in SkillsUSA Web Design (2005) *1st place in all of Northern Kentucky in SkillsUSA-VICA Technical Math (2004) *1st place in all of Northern Kentucky in SkillsUSA-VICA Cisco Internetworking (2003 and 2004) *2nd place in the entire State of Kentucky in FBLA Network Design (2005) *2nd place in all of Northern Kentucky in FBLA Website Development (2004) *2nd place in the entire State of Kentucky in FBLA Technology Concepts (2003)

Past working relationships include: Sony DADC Best Buy Geek Squad MaximumTailgating.com Channel One News Covington Independent Public School District Urban Learning Center Rose-Hulman Institute of Technology

external_links.title: Filmmaking and technology help kids to shape exhibits
